name: comps
command:
print(`These are the currently available commands to check informations about competitions:`)
print(`{p}${IRC.trigger}comps.list country{/}        List competitions in specified country`)
print(`{p}${IRC.trigger}comps.reg competition_name{/}         Check when registration opens, or if it is already closed`)
print(`{p}${IRC.trigger}comps.when competition_name{/}        List time, date and venue of specified competition`)
print(`{p}${IRC.trigger}comps.iscoming(comp) competitor{/}    See if person is coming to specified competition`)
